question_ee: Milline neist oli 1950-ndatel tüdrukute kohustuslik koolivormi osa?
question_en: Which of the following items was a mandatory part of the girls’ school uniform in the 1950s?
description_ee: Vastus on: Põll. Viiekümnendate alguses ei olnud koolivormi kandmise nõue veel üleüldine, küll aga oli tüdrukutele oli ette nähtud pruun volangidega koolipõll ja valge pidupõll.
description_en: The answer is: Apron. In the 1950s, school uniforms were not yet mandatory across the board, but girls were required to wear brown flounced school aprons and white festive aprons.

question_ee: 1960-ndate lõpus võeti kasutusele alt laienevad püksid koolivormi osana, neid kutsuti rahvakeeli:
question_en: In the late 1960s, school uniforms began to feature trousers with downward-widening legs – these were colloquially known as:
description_ee: Vastus on 'tolmuimejateks'. Koolivormi kuuluvate pükste kõrval võisid tüdrukud käia koolis suvaliste tumedate alt laiade pükste ehk rahvakeeli tolmuimejatega.
description_en: The answer is 'vacuum cleaners'. Besides the school uniform trousers, girls were also allowed to wear other dark trousers with downward-widening legs, colloquially known as vacuum cleaners.
